errors.error_description: Uses incorrect Flask command syntax with invalid parameter '--ports' instead of '--port'
correction_candidates: Execute `flask run --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5000` to run the server
Use `flask run --host 0.0.0.0 -p 5000` to start on port 5000
Run with `flask run --bind 0.0.0.0:5000` to serve on all interfaces
Start using `flask run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5000` for external access
errors.golden_answer: Execute `flask run --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5000` to run the server
